did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: The collection includes play scripts, programs, cards, and photographs.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], The Linda Lee Nichols Daniels Papers, 1957-1959, SC# 5010, Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University, Harrisonburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Received from the Alumni Office, April 2006

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Linda Nichols is a 1961 graduate of Madison College and hails from Norfolk, Virginia

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection is comprised of one folder containing two dance cards, four semester program cards, a church service program and two play scripts. The collection consists of four series: Dance Cards, Semester Program Cards, Play Scripts and Photographs.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection consists of four series, each contained wihtin the same folder and arranged as follows:

blockquote.p: I: Dance cards: German Club Mid-Winter, 1958, 1959. Alpha Sigma Tau invitation. Asbury Methodist Church program 1958.
III: Play Scripts: Where Love Is (YWCA play); Alice in Ivyland; play bill for Go West Young Lady
IV: Photographs: reproductions of ten black and white snapshots
